name: Easy Tomato And Cucumber Salad
description: Very delicious and refreshing cucumber tomato salad, quick and easy to make.
steps: 1) In a small bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, granulated onion, sugar and dill weed and set aside.
2) In a large bowl, add your veggies, season them well with salt and pepper, pour the dressing over and toss well.
3) For best results, cover the salad and pop it in the fridge for a couple of hours before serving.
NOTE: Donâ€™t be tempted to make more dressing, as the salad sits the veggies will release their own liquid.
